thread.title: Drake Previews New Song At Amsterdam Show
thread.title_full: Drake Previews New Song At Amsterdam Show

author: Trevor Smith
title: Drake Previews New Song At Amsterdam Show
text:
Home > Music > Drake Previews New Song At Amsterdam Show Drake Previews New Song At Amsterdam Show 3 1 Posted by Trevor Smith , Jan 28, 2017 at 06:22pm Listen to a snippet of a new Drizzy record that may appear on "More Life." 
After some delays, expectations were high for the first date on Drake 's European The Boy Meets World tour, and The Boy delivered on the hype by previewing some new music. As fan site Word On Road points out, Drake played a snippet of a new song during a break in the performance. A video posted by Word On Road (@wordonrd) on Jan 28, 2017 at 2:58pm PST 
The first few lines of the song feature some big brags ("Studio right in my yacht") and extremely Drizzian puns ("I'm in the penthouse but still nothing is sweet.") 
While Drake didn't share any details on the record, it seems likely the track could appear on the OVO rapper's upcoming project More Life , which will be shared as an Apple Music playlist. More Life is still without a release date, but it's expected to arrive sometime in the near future. 
Drake recently joined Rae Sremmurd on stage in Amsterdam. Watch his surprise appearance here . < class="robots-nocontent" rel=""> Jan 28, 2017 at 06:22pm 1 View 
It looks like OBJ will lace up some bright red Supreme X Louis Vuitton custom cleats at the Pro Bowl tomorrow. Listen to a snippet of a new Drizzy record that may appear on "More Life."

While Drake didn't share any details on the record, it seems likely the track could appear on the OVO rapper's upcoming project More Life , which will be shared as an Apple Music playlist. More Life is still without a release date, but it's expected to arrive sometime in the near future.
